text: Khrista tîrtonngei kin ni sikin nin kôm zong thei khom ni unglang. Aninâkachu nin lâia kin om lâihan kin nun ânnêmma, nu'n2:7: nin kôma kin om lâihan kin nun ânnêmma, nû angin; miziek senkhat ngei an dôn chu nin kôma kin om lâihan chu nâingei angin kin nia; nû angin kin ni. a nâingei a donsûi anghan kin om ani.
